activities: LightSpeed VT is a provider of online (web based) learning management system. During the signup for the services provided by LightSpeed VT, we receive and store personal data from our customers in the EU. Also, information entered by end-users into the messaging portion of our platform may be considered personal information. We capture and potentially store this end-user information for our customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We are committed to cooperate fully with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
